data.name: Juanito Arcade Mayhem
data.detailed_description:
Juanito Arcade Mayhem is a new arcade game that invites you to traverse the settings of classic videogames, spiced up with the popular Super Pang mechanics. Experience saving the world from an alien invasion with your own hands before it’s too late.



When the mutant Clonocells from outer space attack, a young and lazy boy by the name of Juanito becomes our last hope. Chosen by Gluk, a bipolar manipulative alien, Juanito must enter an arcade cabinet and defend all the infected retro videogames, armed with nothing but his trusty pyjamas and his fearsome arsenal.



Fight like your life depends on it!

- 70+ unique levels, inspired by 8 classic arcade games.
- Original Soundtrack (with spicy retro flavour).
- Over 70 Steam Achievements that are just waiting to be unlocked.
- Dare to challenge the final boss in an epic battle!



Don’t let the fun stop!

- Put your endurance to the test in Endless Survival Mode! How far can you go?
- More weapons and power-ups that you can count on one hand.
- Includes gorgeous-looking Steam Trading Cards for you to ogle!
- Controller and Keyboard compatibility.

Play it your way!

data.short_description: Juanito Arcade Mayhem revives all the retro classics using the mechanics made popular by Super Pang. Don your finest pyjamas and help Juanito defend our favorite games from the alien Clonocell invasion!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish, German, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10, Windows Server 2008
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10, Windows Server 2008
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
